title: Finding Balance With a Backlog of Emails on The Cigar Authority
itunes:title: Finding Balance With a Backlog of Emails on The Cigar Authority
description:
It always amazes me how many people consider our mailbag episodes to be their favorites. Over the last couple of months we have gotten a lot of emails and this week on The Cigar Authority we play catch up as we go through close to 20 of them on this email centric episode of the #1 cigar podcast on the internet.

In the first hour we will light up one of the hottest new cigars from the 2017 trade show, The Alma Fuerte comes from Plasencia one of the largest tobacco growers in the world. In the second hour we will light up the last cigar of the February Care Package, Equilibrium.

We also have Cigar News, a trip into the Asylum and the Classic 3 Way on the number one listened to Cigar Podcast in the world.

The Cigar Authority is a member of the United Podcast Network and is recorded live in front of a studio audience at Studio 21 Podcast Cafe upstairs at Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss at http://www.2GuysCigars.com/.
